mapper.select: select info.* ,category.name as "shopTypeName" from seller_info info join seller_category category on category.VALUE = info.shop_type where username = #{username}
mapper.update: update seller_info set shop_name = #{shopName}, shop_des = #{shopDes}, shop_img = #{shopImg}, shop_type = #{shopType}, shop_able = #{shopAble} where seller_id = #{sellerId}
